title: Intentional Reflective Education Program for Reducing Diagnostic Errors

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening reflective practice through digital tools and developing problem-solving skills via real-world case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can systematically reflect on and document their cognitive processes while solving complex scientific problems.
Learners can apply at least three reflective questioning frameworks to identify potential diagnostic errors.
Learners can submit improved decision-making proposals incorporating peer feedback through PBL team activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
